item.title: Complete the Un-Completable: The State of AI Completion in JetBrains IDEs

item.title: Support for SLNX Solution Files
item.description: For nearly twenty years, the .NET community has enjoyed working with solution files (*.sln). Due to their tooling-centered format, manually changing these files has always been challenging. Merge conflicts in solution filesâ€”much like merging CSPROJ filesâ€”were commonplace and often resulted in corrupted files or lost changes. The structure of SLN files is overly verboseâ€”an empty [â€¦] Link to article: https://blog.jetbrains.com/dotnet/2024/10/04/support-for-slnx-solution-files/
